property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the SpellPreference (a Application).

property.name: dynamicSpellCheck
property.shortdesc: If true, underlines misspelled and repeated words, uncapitalized proper nouns, and uncapitalized first words in sentences. Note: Valid only when the corresponding properties are true. For information, see check misspelled words, check repeated words, check capitalized words, and check capitalized sentences.

property.name: misspelledWordColor
property.shortdesc: The underline color for misspelled words, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Note: Valid only when both dynamic spell check and check misspelled words are true. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.

property.name: repeatedWordColor
property.shortdesc: The underline color for repeated words, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Note: Valid only when both dynamic spell check and check repeated words are true. . Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.

property.name: uncapitalizedWordColor
property.shortdesc: The underline color for uncapitalized proper nouns, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Note: Valid only when both dynamic spell check and check capitalized words are true. . Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.

property.name: uncapitalizedSentenceColor
property.shortdesc: The underline color for the first word in sentences that do not begin with a capital letter, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Note: Valid when both dynamic spell check and check capitalized sentences are true. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.

property.name: checkMisspelledWords
property.shortdesc: If true, checks for misspelled words.

property.name: checkRepeatedWords
property.shortdesc: If true, checks for repeated words.

property.name: checkCapitalizedWords
property.shortdesc: If true, checks for uncapitalized proper nouns.

property.name: checkCapitalizedSentences
property.shortdesc: If true, checks for uncapitalized first words in sentences.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the SpellPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
